ai-tha-ap244:2.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him,
ai-tha-ap244:2.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap244:2.4_0: for the bonds of the world.
ai-tha-ap244:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap244:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap244:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap244:4.1_0: When they have a seven eons,
ai-tha-ap244:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nāgas.
ai-tha-ap244:7.1_0: In the second of the Elder Nuns, having a companion,
